transferFileToURL

public void transferFileToURL(java.io.File fileToMove,
                              java.net.URL newLocationURL)
                       throws FatalException
Transfers a local file into the specified URL. Currently only 'file' protocol is supported so it must point to a local directory/folder. If the file already exists in the completed directory, overwrite it.

Specified by:
transferFileToURL in class BatchIngestURLhandler
Parameters:
newLocationURL - location to move the current file to.
Throws:
FatalException - non recoverable error
